about_the_game:
1 Million Zombies is a post-apocalyptic action game where the player takes on a world overrun by hordes of the undead. The objective of the game is to survive as long as possible by driving a series of vehicles and eliminating as many zombies as possible.

The game features a variety of vehicles, from fast sports cars to heavy armored trucks, each with its unique strengths and weaknesses. The player must strategically choose the right vehicle for the job as they navigate through the different environments, such as city streets, rural areas, and highways.

The game is set in an open-world environment, and the player must explore different areas to scavenge for resources such as fuel, ammunition, and vehicle upgrades. Along the way, the player will encounter different types of zombies, each with its own unique abilities and weaknesses.

As the player progresses, they will encounter larger and more challenging zombie hordes, requiring them to use more advanced tactics and weaponry. The game also features a variety of missions and objectives that must be completed to progress to the next level.

1 Million Zombies is a thrilling and action-packed game that will keep players on the edge of their seats as they battle through waves of the undead. With its stunning graphics, intense gameplay, and challenging difficulty level, 1 Million Zombies is sure to be a hit with fans of the zombie genre.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or similar.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 similar.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: 1 Million Zombies is a casual arcade inspired game, where the players main goal is to destroy as many Zombies as possible with an Array of Vehicles and Weapons. Do you have what it takes to kill 1 Million Zombies?
